pages.text: Based on wuxing, you can handle witchcraft with 5 types of Reiryoku energy. Wood, fire, earth, metal, and water element.
Craft a Rock from a Cobblestone on Stonecutter.
When you place a Pointed Dripstone above the Rock and wait a little, the Rock will turn to Weatherd Rock.
Craft a Shide from Papers.
Use a Shide to a wood element block to get a Wood Element Shide.$(br2) The same applies to other elements.

Craft a Wood Element Sacred Rock. $(br2)1 Reiryoku will be generated when you place a wood element block on the side two sheets of paper are drawn.$(br2)Right-click to see the amount of stored Reiryoku.

Place a Yomi Stone or a Cobbled Yomi Stone on top of a Chiseled Lacquer Log and wait a little when a required animal is nearby.$(br2)Then the animal disappears and the Chiseled Lacquer Log turns into a Petrified Log with specific element Amber.$(br2)The required animals are Chicken for wood element, Sheep for fire element, Cow for earth element, Horse for metal element, and Pig for water element.
Restraints with a Zabuton make it easier.
Wood Element Amber is dropped from Petrified Log with Wood Element Amber. The same applies to other elements.

If a Yomi Stone or a Cobbled Yomi Stone is placed on a Chiseled Lacquer Log without any animals nearby and left to stand, it will become a Petrified Log.$(br2)You can craft Petrified Planks from Petrified Log.$(br2)Both of this do not disappear in fire. The appropriate tool is Pickaxe.

Craft a Birch Wood Element Emitter and place on the side of a block which can export Reiryoku.$(br2)It transport 1 Reiryoku per perticle if a transportation route is established.$(br2)The transportation will be stopped when it recieve a redstone signal.$(br2)Right-click to see the amount of stored Reiryoku.
Craft a Birch Sanbo.$(br2)Right-click to place a item.

Craft a Birch Wood Element Alter.$(br2)Place 4 Birch Sanbos on each side of the alter, put ingredients on the sanbos, and provite Reiryoku energy to the alter to craft items. $(br2)But preparation still needs to be done.
Craft a Birch Mirror.$(br2)By using this mirror, you can bend a transportation route of Reiryoku. $(br2)The path bends in the direction of the angle of reflection equal to the angle of incidence.

It is not possible to supply Reiryoku power to the altar from sides. Supply at an angle or from above or below.

Craft a Birch Wood Element Onusa.$(br2)Onusa is suitable for storing Reiryoku energy, as it can both import and export Reiryoku.$(br2)The paths of Reiryoku transport can be branched and merged by using this as a relay point.

Craft a Wood Element Magatama.$(br2)Right-clicking on a Wood Element Onusa allows the spiritual power stored in the Onusa to be transferred to a Magatama.$(br2)When using items that consume Reiryoku power, the player must have a Magatama in his or her inventory.
